intro:
It’s movie night, and the cats are out!
Find all the hidden kitties in lively cinema settings — from popcorn stands to cozy theater seats and movies with cats.
description:
It’s movie night — and guess who showed up at the cinema? Cats!
In Cats Visiting the Cinema, you’ll explore five hand-crafted, cinema-themed scenes packed with hidden cats. From the grand entrance in Chicago to the buzzing popcorn stands, and finally, the magical movie screening room — every location hides 80 cats waiting to be found.

Along the way, you’ll collect five unique Action Cats, each hidden in a different level to complete your collection.

Play at your own pace in classic mode, or turn up the excitement in Arcade Mode, where you’ll race against the clock to spot every kitty. Whether you're a casual gamer or a completionist, there's a little something for everyone.

Get ready for a cozy, lighthearted game filled with charm, cats, and movie magic!
